last_episode_to_air.name: Adarsh is Attracted to Swadheenta
last_episode_to_air.overview: Adarsh bumps into a girl, Swadheenta, who fits perfectly into his definition of a soulmate. Swadheenta loses to Adarsh at Akshay and Shraddha's sangeet ceremony. Adarsh introduces himself to Swadheenta. She calls him for help when a few goons corner her.

name: Dahleez
overview: Swadheenta, a lawyer, falls in love with an honest IAS officer, Adarsh Sinha. However, their relationship has to go through several tests, the reins of which are in the hands of his mother, Suhasini.
